description.en:
Akira's older brother, Atsushi, has been missing for two years.   
  
One day, a mysterious woman who seems to know Atsushi's last known whereabouts appears and offers to take him and his friends there : to the island of Higanjima.   
  
Thus the great Man vs Vampire epic begins…
description.pt-br: O jovem promissor Atsushi desaparece deixando toda a sua responsabilidade como "filho perfeito" recair sobre seu irmão Akira. Dois anos se passam e agora Akira e seus leais amigos se deparam com uma pista do paradeiro de Atsushi, mas junto com a pista e a bela jovem que a traz está um monstro com força descomunal, olhos vermelho-escuro e cabelos brancos sedento por sangue. O que teria acontecido a Atsushi? Será que Akira e seus amigos conseguirão sobreviver para descobrir?

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

title.en: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou sareta node, Maou wo Torikaeshi ga Tsukanai hodo Tsuyoku Sodatetemita

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーを追放されたので、魔王を取り返しがつかないほど強く育ててみた

altTitles.en: I Was Exiled from the Heroes' Party So I Tried Raising the Demon Lord to Be Unbelievably Strong

description.en:
One day, Raizel was suddenly summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord — but he was summoned with zero combat power. However, that was just a mistake of the combat capability calculator and he was in fact an overwhelmingly strong individual. 

After being exiled, Raizel set out on his own and during his adventures came to realize that the demons weren't actually evil entities and joined up with them. Upon learning information which could revolutionize the state of the world as it currently stands, Raizel and the demonkin companions set out to take down the empire that had summoned him to this world.

title.en: The Villainess Refuses to Flirt With the Male Lead

altTitles.zh-ro: E Nü Jujue Pao Nan Zhu

description.en:
Transmigrating as the villainess of a cliché imperial manhua isn't scary, what's scary is that the male leads are all children! Not only do I have to take care of children, but I'm also being courted by one of them and being called "wife"! Ms. Hong would like to say: "Fuck you, god!" 凸(｀⌒´メ)凸

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://page.kakao.com/content/59080258)

altTitles.ja: サジちゃんの病み日記

description.en: Sazi-chan has a girl she likes. Though her feelings are too pure for anyone to understand, it is definitely true love. Taking pictures, stealing, stabbing, assaulting, that too, is love.

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

altTitles.ja: ハニートラップ・シェアハウス

description.en: As a child, Hayato promised to marry his first love, Seraphy. Fifteen years later, he has become one of the world’s greatest spies, all while never falling for the temptations of enemy agents. A mission to expose rival operatives turns chaotic when Hayato reunites with Seraphy, and each realizes the other is a spy. Now the pair must live together, torn between love and duty. The question is…who will break first?
description.pt-br:
Quando criança, Hayato prometeu se casar com seu primeiro amor, Seraphy. Quinze anos depois, ele se tornou um dos maiores espiões do mundo, sem nunca cair nas tentações dos agentes inimigos.

Uma missão para expor agentes rivais se torna caótica quando Hayato se reencontra com Seraphy, e cada um deles percebe que o outro é um espião.

Agora, os dois precisam viver juntos, divididos entre o amor e o dever. A questão é... quem vai se quebrar primeiro?

altTitles.th: คนลึกไขปริศนาลับ

description.de: Ein teuflisch guter Butler ist Sebastian Michaelis, der dem Familienoberhaupt der noblen Phantomhives dient. Teuflisch ist hier wörtlich zu nehmen, denn Sebastian ist wirklich ein Dämon, mit dem das Oberhaupt der Phantomhives einen Pakt schloss. Seitdem hat er nicht nur die wichtigste Position in der Dienerschaft inne, sondern ist auch Leibwächter und Auftragskiller in Personalunion! Earl of Phantomhive ist der 12-jährige Ciel, der nicht nur das Familienunternehmen führt, sondern in seiner Funktion als Earl auch ein wichtiger Vertrauter Königin Victorias ist. Denn sie verlässt sich darauf, dass jede Gefahr diskret und schnell durch die Phantomhives beseitigt wird...
description.en: Just a stone's throw from London lies the manor house of the illustrious Phantomhive earldom and its master, one Ciel Phantomhive. Earl Phantomhive is a giant in the world of commerce, Queen Victoria's faithful servant...and a slip of a twelve-year-old boy. Fortunately, his loyal butler, Sebastian, is ever at his side, ready to carry out the young master's wishes. And whether Sebastian is called to save a dinner party gone awry or probe the dark secrets of London's underbelly, there apparently is nothing Sebastian cannot do. In fact, one might even say Sebastian is too good to be true...or at least, too good to be human...
description.es:
Sebastian es el mayordomo de la familia Phantomhive, aristócratas de la alta sociedad inglesa. Él es perfecto en Todo. Detaca en: etiqueta, cultura, cocina y hasta en artes marciales... Es el acompañante de un joven amo muy caprichoso de tan sólo 12 años y siempre viste su frac negro, que aletea tras él. Este es un manga sobre un mayordomo perfecto para tu hora del té.

---
Un mayordomo que se precie tiene que estar dispuesto a lo que sea por el buen funcionamiento de la casa de su señor. Eso incluye prepararle el té que le gusta, asegurarse de que el resto del servicio sea eficiente, que todo funcione como un reloj… y en el caso especial de Sebastian, poner al servicio del joven conde Ciel sus habilidades especiales como mayordomo infernal.
description.fi:
Sebastian on arvostetun Phantomhiven aristokraattisuvun täydellinen hovimestari. Hän on tietävä, oppinut, tyylikäs, loistava kokki ja taitaa taistelulajit. Silti hän saa juosta pikimustan frakin liepeet liehuen itsekkään 12-vuotiaan isäntänsä asioilla.

Yliluonnollisen taitavan hovimestarin palvelukset eivät kuitenkaan ole ilmaisia ja lopullisen palkkion joutuu maksamaan nuori isäntä. Sitä ennen parivaljakon pitää selvittää Lontoon alamaailman saloja ja kostaa pari murhaa.
description.fr: Sébastian est majordome au service de Ciel Phantomhive, héritier d'une grande famille de la noblesse anglaise. En matière d'érudition, d'éducation, d'art culinaire, rien à redire, il est parfait. Mais ne vous fiez pas à sa distinction, si vous vous en prenez à son jeune maître, vous découvrirez sa vraie nature... Ciel aurait-il signé un pacte avec le Diable...?!
description.id:
Apa jadinya kalau seorang butler tidak bisa mengerjakan pekerjaan seperti ini? 

Sebastian adalah seorang butler keluarga bangsawan terkemuka Inggris, yaitu Phantomhive. Ia sempurna dalam segala bidang. Berpengetahuan luas, elegan, jago masak, dan pandai bela diri. Ia selalu mengenakan jas buntut berwarna hitam kelam. Majikannya, Ciel Phantomhive, adalah seorang anak yang masih berumur 12 tahun dan bersifat egois. 

Simak kisah seorang butler nomor satu di dunia yang sangat cocok dengan teh warna merah...
description.it: Richiestissimo dai fan di tutta Italia, finalmente arriva il manga capolavoro di Yana Toboso! Una storia in cui un irresistibile black humour si fonde sapientemente al dramma, in un intreccio ricco di emozionanti colpi di scena. Sullo sfondo di un’Inghilterra vittoriana sapientemente rielaborata, preparatevi a scoprire il segreto che lega Ciel Phantomhive, un ragazzino che è l’unico erede rimasto in vita del casato dei Phantomhive, al suo perfetto, quasi irreale, maggiordomo Sebastian. Perché in questa storia, tutti sono molto più di quello che sembrano. State per scoprire perché!
description.ja:
あくまで、執事ですから
彼の職業は執事。彼は今日もお茶を煎れ、銀食器を磨く。そう、すべては主人のために…。
description.pl:
Sebastian to kamerdyner w domu arystokratycznej rodziny Phantomhive. Jest utalentowany, wykształcony, dystyngowany, zna się na gotowaniu i sztukach walki. Słowem, jest doskonały w każdym calu. Jednak odziany w czarny frak kamerdyner zaczyna drżeć ze wzburzenia, gdy jego dwunastoletni pan wydaje rozkazy...

---
Sebastian to kamerdyner w domu arystokratycznej rodziny Phantomhive. Jest utalentowany, wykształcony, dystyngowany, zna się na gotowaniu i sztukach walki. Słowem, jest doskonały w każdym calu. Jednak odziany w czarny frak kamerdyner, zaczyna drżeć ze wzburzenia, gdy jego dwunastoletni pan wydaje rozkazy… Zapraszamy do lektury bestsellerowej mangi Yany Toboso.
description.ru: Альтернативная Англия XIX-го века, роскошное поместье графа Фантомхайва, дружная компания нерасторопных слуг, над которыми возвышается во всех смыслах этого слова безупречный Себастьян. Юный граф Сиэль любит разные игры, и многочисленные способности дворецкого то и дело находят себе применение. Какая же тайна между дворецким и Графом? Ведь эти двое заключили важный контракт, который касается не только кулинарных талантов Себастьяна. Секреты правильного чая, жестокость итальянской мафии, неуклюжесть слуги-новичка и даже привычки родственников графа — всё по плечу Себастьяну, недаром его любимая присказка переводится и как «Я просто дьявольски хороший дворецкий», и как «Я и демон, и дворецкий».
description.th:
คนที่เป็นหัวหน้าคนรับใช้นั้น ถ้าทำไม่ได้ขนาดนี้ จะใช้ได้อย่างไรกันล่ะครับ?

เซบาสเตียน หัวหน้าคนรับใช้แห่งตระกูลแฟนทอมไฮฟ์ ตระกูลขุนนางมีชื่อของอังกฤษ
เขามีความสมบูรณ์พร้อมในทุกๆด้าน ไม่ว่าจะเป็นด้านสติปัญญา การศึกษา ความเป็นผู้ดี อาหาร หรือศาสตรวุธ
เมื่อต้องมารับใช้เจ้านายอายุ 12 ปี ที่เอาแต่ใจตัวเอง ชุดสูทชายด้านหลังยาวดำขลับก็พลิ้วขยับสั่นไหว

การ์ตูนเกี่ยวกับหัวหน้าคนรับใช้ที่เข้ากันกับชาฝรั่งที่สุดในโลกมาถึงมือคุณแล้ว...
description.tr:
Kahya olacak biri bu kadarını da yapabilir herhalde?

Sebastian, İngiltere’nin saygın aristokrat ailelerinden biri olan “Phantomhive Ailesi”nin kahyasıdır. Kendisi, bilgi birikimi, kültür, asalet, aşçılık ve dövüş sanatları konusunda mükemmeldir. On iki yaşındaki egoist efendisi için simsiyah kuyruklu takım elbisesi savrulup durmaktadır. İşte size dünyanın en iyi çayını yapan kahyasının mangası…
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn ra vào thời Victoria. Ở ngoại thành London có một toàn lâu đài nguy nga vốn là nơi ở của gia tộc Phantomhive. Hiện giờ chủ nhân của toàn lâu đài đó là bá tước Ciel Phantomhive, một đứa trẻ mới 12 tuổi nhưng lại là người đứng đầu gia tộc Phantomhive, đồng thời cũng là người đứng đầu thế giới ngầm. Bên cạnh cậu lúc nào cũng có Sebastian Michaelis - một quản gia cực kỳ tài giỏi và luôn tuân theo mọi mệnh lệnh của cậu. Tuy nhiên, bọc sau lớp vỏ một quản gia, Sebastian thật sự không phải là con người, mà là một con quỷ. Sở dĩ một con quỷ chấp nhận làm một quản gia bình thường là vì Sebastian đã ký kết một “hợp đồng” với Ciel. Nội dung bản hợp đồng đó chính là Sebastian sẽ trở thành sức mạnh của Ciel, luôn trung thành phục vụ Ciel cho đến khi Ciel trả được mối thù giết cha mẹ. Đổi lại, sau khi Ciel trả thù xong, tức lúc bản hợp đồng kết thúc, thì Sebastian sẽ nuốt chửng linh hồn của Ciel xem như là thù lao. Dấu hiệu thể hiện hợp đồng đã được ký kết nằm trong con mắt phải của Ciel và trên mu bàn tay trái của Sebastian. Trong thời gian ở lại bên cạnh cậu chủ của mình, Sebastian đã cùng cậu chủ phá nhiều vụ án và trải qua nhiều cuộc phiêu lưu. Từ đó, nhiều bức màn bí mật dần dần được hé mở. Tập 21 Cậu chủ của tôi ơi, cậu đã sai một điều rồi ạ! Cơ thể Sebastian đã thoát khỏi lời nguyền. Thế nhưng, vào lúc này, những chủ nhân thực sự của Thung lũng ma sói lại ráo riết đuổi theo Lục phù thủy và ma pháp tối thượng mà Ciel đã cướp mất, nhăm nhe hàm răng trắng nhởn của mình. Và sau bóng lưng toan tính tẩu thoát của gã quý tộc ma quỷ, một con quái thú màu xanh rêu, đang chậm rãi, chậm rãi nhích lại gần..
description.zh: 身为一个执事，连这种事都不会，那怎么成？ 英国的名门贵族法多姆凯贝家，有一位执事——锡巴斯查恩——不论是知识、教养、品位、料理、武术……他都样样精通， 面对那位任性的十二岁主人，漆黑的燕尾服在摇摆、摇摆…… 为您送上全世界 适合品尝着红茶欣赏的执事漫画……
description.es-la: Sebastian Michaelis. Mayordomo, cocinero, guardaespaldas, jardinero y experto en etiqueta. Siempre hace que su joven jefe, Ciel Phantomhive, mantenga el prestigio y la integridad física. Nunca permite que algo quede fuera de lugar o que los sirvientes caigan en la holgazanería. ¿Pero qué misterio guarda este singular hombre, que observa una agilidad y fuerza inimaginables y a quien las balas no le afectan? ¡Un personaje que no debe estar fuera de la mente fantástica de los asiduos lectores de mangas, y a quien podrás conocer en este primer tomo de *Black Butler*!

description.en: A cocky and confident Yajima harbors dislike for Torikai, a cool and talented fellow trainee in the Rescue Team. The two constantly quarrel, but one day they cross the line while squabbling and end up sleeping together. Yajima regrets it, but at the same time he cannot get Torikai's pleading expression out of his head. However, because they have been rivals until now, he just can't bring himself to be honest with Torikai.
description.fr: Yajima, arrogant et sûr de lui, n'aime pas Torikai, un collègue de l'équipe de secours, cool et talentueux. Les deux se disputent constamment, mais un jour ils dépassent les bornes en se chamaillant et finissent par coucher ensemble. Yajima le regrette, mais en même temps, il ne peut s'empêcher de penser à l'expression suppliante de Torikai. Cependant, comme ils ont été rivaux jusqu'à présent, il ne peut pas se résoudre à être honnête avec Torikai.

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and it's neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"!
Feelings that couldn't be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!

altTitles.ja: ゆるふわ人妻 秘密のパート
ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

title.en: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

title.en: With Vengeance, Sincerely, Your Broken Saintess

altTitles.ja: 傷だらけ聖女より報復をこめて

altTitles.en: Vengeance from a Saint Full of Wounds
The Holy Wound Became a Villain

altTitles.es: La santa herida se convirtió en villana

altTitles.ja-ro: Kizu Darake Seijo Yori Houfuku wo Komete

description.ar: لوا ، قديس مرشح مع قوى الشفاء. ومع ذلك ، فقد كانت قدراتها معيبة ، وستتألم وتتألم لنفسها من أجل نقل الأعراض لنفسها والشفاء منها. عاملها المرشحون القديسون على أنها عيب ، لكن صديقتها المقربة أريان كانت دائمًا هناك. في يوم من الأيام ، يحتضر جاروت ، قائد الفرسان الذي تهتم به روا. بعد أن تلتئم جراحه تمامًا ، تتجول لوا بين الحياة والموت في حدود قدراتها. ومع ذلك ، عندما استيقظ ، كان كل الفضل يعود إلى أريان ، وتم تحديد خطوبة جاروت وأريان. بالنظر إلى طبيعة أريان الحقيقية ، تعرض للضرب المبرح من قبل جاروت. في حالة من اليأس ، تعهد لوا بعدم شفاء أي شخص بعد الآن. ثم يسأل الأمير الثاني سوين ، “لماذا لا تنتقم من أولئك الذين أهانوك
description.en: Lua, a candidate saint with healing powers. However, her abilities were flawed, and she would be pained and painful to herself in order to transfer the symptoms to herself and heal them. The saintly candidates treated her as a flaw, but only her best friend Ariane was always there. One day, Garrot, the Knight Commander whom Lua cares about, is dying. After completely healing his wounds, Lua wanders between life and death at the limit of her abilities. However, when he awoke, all the credit belonged to Ariane, and Garrot and Arian's engagement had been decided. Seeing Arian's true nature, he is coldly beaten by Garrot. In despair, Lua vowed not to heal anyone anymore. Then the Second Prince Swen asks, "Why don't you take revenge on those who have demeaned you?" She uses another ability she has been hiding – the atrocious ability to inflict healing symptoms on others – and joins forces with Swen to start a new life as an "evil woman" instead of a "saint."

Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

Masks are art, dance is martial arts!
The despised mask dancer 'Bongsan' follows the map left by his master
To stop the monster tiger 'Saphung Black Tiger' who wants to become king
He sets out on an adventure to find the legendary 'Human Mask'...

title.en: Kuzuless Oblige 18-kin ge sekai no kuzu akuyaku ni tensei shite shimatta ore wa, gensaku chishiki no chikara de dōshite mo mobu jinsei o tsukamitoritai.

altTitles.en: Scum・less Oblige, Reborn as the Scummy Villain in an 18+ Adult Game, and I Absolutely Want to Seize the Mob Using My Knowledge of the Original Story.

altTitles.ja: クズレス・オブリージュ　18禁ゲー世界のクズ悪役に転生してしまった俺は、原作知識の力でどうしてもモブ人生をつかみ取りたい

description.en:
Before I knew it, I was in a world of 18+ games with magic and erotica.

In it, I was reborn as Ultos, the worst scum in history. If I continue like this, I will meet the worst possible fate.

Somehow, I must be reborn from the hated character known as 'ScumUltos' into a pure and innocent mob character...!!

Rise up from being the worst douchebag villain of all time!

altTitles.ja: 夢見るメイドのティータイム

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪
description.es-la:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.

title.en: Fist of the North Star - Strawberry Flavor

altTitles.ja: 北斗の拳 イチゴ味

description.en:
In this *very* zany take on the dramatic series by Buronson and Tetsuo Hara, the end of the century… wasn't so bad, actually. A *very* special and brave Holy Emperor, Souther, wants to become more "involved" and to be on "friendly terms" with the noble Kenshiro & his posse. *Especially* Kenshiro. Due to his very outgoing nature, he also crashes the homes of his other buddies, often when they *especially* don't want him to show up!  
  
Join Souther as he releases his feelings in heart-throbbing, mind-bending confessions, settles complex and engrossing territorial disputes with deep and intricate consequences, enjoys the simple and introspective pleasures of a quiet dinner, and climbs the top of the rough and brutal pyramid that is the idol world - with the help of his best buddies, of course! Maybe even Kenshiro will be there - who knows!  
  
By the time it got its anime in 2015, *Strawberry Flavor* had sold over 1 million copies in Japan. The anime was composed of 2-minute long, abridged adaptations of select chapters from the first three volumes. They were placed after the main episodes of *DD Fist of the North Star* season 2.  
  
Every volume also contains at least one *gaiden* (side story). These gaiden are drawn in Yukito's (the elder sister of Yukito Imouto) normal artstyle, and expand on characters who did not receive gaiden during the Hokuto Gaiden period in the late 2000's.  
  
Gaiden List:  
Volume 1: Spade, Club & Diamond, Heart  
Volume 2: Souther  
Volume 3: Shuren & Huey  
Volume 4: Fudo  
Volume 5: Yuda  
Volume 6: Shin  
Volume 7: Falco & friends, Ein  
Volume 8: Ogai  
Volume 9: Devil Rebirth

Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to "meet the criminal who killed his father". That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as the "Shinagawa Pierrot".
description.fr: “Le clown de Shinagawa” avait défrayé la chronique lors de son arrestation : cette tueuse en série corpulente, déguisée en clown, avait découpé et caché les corps de ses victimes… Pour aider l'enfant d'une victime à retrouver la tête de son père, Arata Natsume, assistant social, va la rencontrer. Mais contre toute attente, une frêle et fragile jeune fille arrive en face de lui. Est-elle vraiment un monstre sanguinaire ? Pour le savoir, Arata va devoir se livrer à un jeu dangereux en se prétendant amoureux d'elle…
description.pt: Natsume trabalha no conselho tutelar, está em seus trinta anos e solteiro, sem planos para casa. Mas um dia, ele recebe um pedido de uma criança a qual estava a cargo, de "encontrar o criminoso que matou seu pai". Tal assassino é a serial killer Shinagawa Shinu, também conhecida como "Pierrot Shinagawa".
description.es-la: Arata Natsume trabaja en un centro de orientación infantil, tiene más de treinta años y está soltero sin planes de matrimonio. Pero un día recibe una petición del niño que tenía a su cargo, Takuto, para "conocer al criminal que mató a su padre". Ese asesino en serie es Shinagawa Shinju, también conocido como el "Shinagawa Pierrot".

description.en:
Jang Suchan is an extraordinary college student at the top of the social food chain. But underneath the perfect façade, he hides a pair of insect wings that suddenly grew when he used a mysterious bug spray called "Jungle Juice.” Suchan's life crumbles when he bares his wings to the world to save someone's life. When all hope seems lost, Suchan stumbles upon a hidden world of insect humans where everyone is accepted for what they are.

But the law of the jungle governs this secret society and all must fend for themselves in order to survive.
description.fr:
Le mystérieux insecticide "Jungle Juice" a fait de lui un humain insecte.  
Jang Su-chan, un étudiant qui cachait ses dents, a un jour ressemblé à cela.  
Vous serez vu par tout le monde, et vous serez dans le monde des insectes.  
Vous vous battrez contre la logique du faible…  
  
Action/ Fantaisie de divers pouvoirs d'insectes  
Le nouveau héros de Super String Universe fait son apparition !
description.pt-br: Jang Suchan é um aluno universitário no topo de sua cadeia social. Mas, debaixo da faixada perfeita, ele esconde um par de asas de inseto que cresceram de repente após usar um inseticida misterioso chamado “Jungle Juice”. A vida de Suchan desmorona quando ele exibe suas asas ao mundo afim salvar a vida de outra pessoa. Quando toda a esperança parece perdida, Suchan se depara com um mundo escondido de insetos humanos onde todos são aceitos por quem são. Mas a lei da selva governa essa sociedade secreta e todos devem lutar para sobreviverem.

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba no Monogatari - Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: 君のラブを見せてくれ！

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiàng wǒ zhǎnlù nǐ de ài

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？

description.en:
Im Dajun is a high school student who gets bullied at school every day. He came across an interview on TV just when he was on the verge of giving up on life. It was with a murderer who killed the classmates that bullied him. Dajun becomes inspired by what he saw and decides to take revenge as well.

His revenge was successful. However, his life steered into an undesired direction. Im Dajun, leaving school, ends up joining a strange Runaway Fam.

The young runaway, Im Dajun, no longer suffers from the bullies at his school. Instead, he now must survive against even more vicious thugs on the streets.

---

description.ja:
これは生存を賭けた命がけの闘い！

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001592)
description.ko:
고등학생 임다준은 학교에서 늘상 괴롭힘을 당하는 게 일상이었다. 삶을 포기하기 직전 우연히 본 티비 속 동급생 살해범의 인터뷰에 감명을 받고 복수를 결심하게 된다.
복수는 성공했지만 삶은 원치않는 방향으로 흘러가게 되고.. 학교에서 나온 임다준은 범상치않은 가출팸에 들어가게 된다.
가출청소년 임다준은 더이상 학교 안 일진들에게 시달리지 않게 되었지만 그보다 잔혹한 길거리의 양아치들을 상대로 살아남아야만 한다.

삶의 끝자락에 내몰린 고등학생 임다준의 길거리 생존기!

description.zh:
懦弱少年复仇后无家可归，
残酷的街头生存挑战开始！
男主任多骏经常被欺负。在他想要寻短见的那一刻，偶然看到电视里的一段采访，感触颇深，决定报仇。而后虽然复仇成功，但他的人生却也朝着无法预测的方向发展。被父亲赶出家门的他开始街头流浪，必须要面对更残酷的街头混混生活。被逼上绝路的他能否生存下来呢？

---

description.zh-hk:
高中生林多俊每天在學校遭受以李道允為首的不良學生們的霸凌，在他想結束自己的生命以解脫的前一晚，偶然在電視上看到殺害多名霸凌者的高中生的訪問，而萌生報仇的念頭。某次又受到李道允的霸凌時，他將道允推向衝來的貨車。在看似成功的復仇之後，席捲而來的是....？

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: She is the neighbor Angel, I am spoilt by her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation Record of a Misanthrope

description.en:
I don't trust any human being.  
  
An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.  
  
Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.

Due to a near-death experience, a Japanese college student named Hiro gains the ability to see and converse with ghosts. By forming contracts with these ghosts, he becomes a powerful necromancer. But how will he fare in this strange new world?

title.en: I Brought Home a Succubus Who Failed to Find a Job.

altTitles.pt-br: Levei para casa uma súcubos que não conseguiu encontrar um emprego.

description.en: Man brings home succubus, doesn’t get fucked. Instead, gets a cute succubus to take care of him.

description.en:
The adventures of a baby shark in nostalgia-filled Yauo Town. 

Cider on a summer day, freeze pops, radio calisthenics, festival stalls, and hanging out with friends. The world sparkles when reflected in the eyes of the baby shark.

A little retro, a little wistful, and the warmest short comic!

altTitles.fr: Un café au lait sans lait

description.en: A male office worker falls in love with the owner of a small coffee shop in a corner of the big city.
About best friends Yachiyo Inugami and Suzu Nekoyama. Inugami likes cats and has a dog-like personality. Nekoyama likes dogs and has a cat-like personality.

title.en: Ore ni wa Kono Kuragari ga Kokochiyo Katta: Zetsubou kara Hajimaru Isekai Seikatsu, Kami no Kimagure de Kyousei Haishinchuu

altTitles.ja: 俺にはこの暗がりが心地よかった　―絶望から始まる異世界生活、神の気まぐれで強制配信中―

altTitles.en: The Darkness Was Comfortable for Me

description.en:
“I will have the 1,000 people I have chosen go to a parallel world.”

Chaos spread once those words of God were displayed to the whole world.

Kurose Hikaru, whose childhood friend had been chosen, was killed together with her on the same day she was supposed to be transferred. However, for some reason, Hikaru didn’t die and, even though he wasn’t chosen at first, he ended up as one of the [Otherworlders that will have all their actions live broadcasted to Earth].

Transferred without any preparations at all to that accursed land, he faced threats innumerable times and somehow managed to survive with his Gift, the Dark Spirit Abilities.

“I must not die. I am sure the people on Earth are all rooting for me after all…”

This is the story of a young boy who is tossed about by the gazes of the viewers, yet eventually manages to raise his head and walk forward.
(NovelUpdates)

A slightly mysterious and heartwarming story about the smallest cat in the world and a high school boy. A fantastic cat named Tenohira Neko, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, appears to Kanade, a first-year high school student. He is told that if he likes it, it will live with him...?

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

description.en: A hidden love story of a ghost princess who never loved anyone. General Jahyeon of Heeran Nation marries Soru, a ‘princess who sees ghosts’ by the king’s order. Jahyeon is cold to Soru, but he has the power to ward off ghosts, hence Soru wants to stay by his side. Soru is willing to sacrifice everything for Jahyeon, who is her only safe haven. Jahyeon is getting more and more concerned about Soru, but…
description.uk: Таємнича історія кохання принцеси-привида, яка ніколи нікого не любила. Генерал Джа Хьон з нації Хіран одружується із Со Ру, «принцесою, яка бачить привидів», за наказом короля. Джа Хьон холодно ставиться до Со Ру, але якимсь чином він відлякує привидів, тому вона хоче залишитися з ним. Со Ру готова пожертвувати всім заради Джа Хьона, який здатен дати їй відчуття безпеки. Він дедалі більше непокоїться за принцесу, але...

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

The story of a charming girl cursed to need the bathroom whenever she's nervous, and a reclusive boy with a special power that helps her hold it in.  
  
Last-minute adventures.

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

description.fr:
Yang Dojin a toujours travaillé dur depuis son enfance pour essayer d'exceller dans tous les domaines. Mais lorsqu'il a rencontré Lee Tae-Woong au lycée, il a commencé à avoir un complexe d'infériorité.

Peu importe ce qu'il faisait, Dojin était toujours placé en deuxième position par rapport à Tae-Woong. Ils sont même devenus amis, bien que Dojin ait toujours été ouvert à la compétition avec Tae-Woong. Devenu de plus en plus jaloux, il décide alors de ruiner la préparation de Tae-Woong à l'examen d'entrée à l'université en lui faisant une fausse confession d'amour !

10 ans plus tard, Yang Dojin rejoint le même lycée en tant que professeur de littérature. Mais quel coup du sort ! C'est là qu'il retrouve Lee Tae-Woong, qui a rejoint l'école en tant qu'infirmier.

Dès lors, la vie professionnelle de Dojin en tant que professeur devient un véritable enfer.
